properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_THM, MEMBER_Q_CD, MEMBER_A, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBER_QUERY USING(MEMBER_Q_CD) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NICK) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ?
